channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Trump's deportation gut-check

item.title: Scoop: Moreno opens up Senate front in MAGA's war on Fed chair Powell
item.description: Sen. Bernie Moreno (R-Ohio) is providing some supporting Senate fire in President Trump's unrelenting assault on Fed Chair Jerome Powell. Why it matte...

item.title: Websites expand ancestry records of enslaved people
item.description: Two genealogy sites are adding troves of historical materials about enslaved people in the U.S. to databases, which could give many of their descendan...

item.title: "I don't think it's a good idea": GOP senators are not fans of Trump's new TikTok delay
item.description: Some Senate Republicans wish President Trump would quit standing in the way of the TikTok ban . Why it matters: A bipartisan majority passed legislati...

item.title: The U.S. could join Israel's war with Iran to deploy this 30,000-pound bomb
item.description: The U.S. is in possession of the world's most powerful non-nuclear bomb. Data: Royal United Services Institute ; Graphic: Kavya Beheraj/Axios A 30,000...

item.title: We asked 1,000 Americans if they support U.S. strikes on Iran. This is how they responded.
item.description: A one-day Washington Post poll shows only 25 percent of Americans support launching airstrikes against Iran over its nuclear program.

item.title: Trump gave Iran an ultimatum but has made no final decision on war
item.description: The president told reporters at the White House on Wednesday that Iranian officials are eager to negotiate but that it may be too late.

item.title: Democrats raise war powers concerns as Trump mulls Iran strike
item.description: The pushback follows Trump’s encroachment almost every congressional prerogative — from taking control of the power of the purse to threatening tariff...

item.title: SAMHSA has fought drug and mental health crises. Now it’s in crisis.
item.description: Staff and budget cuts will result in fewer services for people fighting mental illness and addiction, including Narcan distribution.

item.title: Members of Congress worry about lack of plan as political violence rises
item.description: Rep. Derek Kilmer (D-Washington) in September explained his fear of how a narrowly divided Congress could inspire a perverse madman to target federal ...

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Trump’s contract-cutting blitz rattles a once-flourishing DC industry
item.description: The General Services Administration, which oversees government contracting, is leading a review of more than 20,000 consulting agreements for what is ...

item.title: Trump’s chaotic economy is causing headaches for Democrats in New Jersey's governor race
item.description: The crowded contest in the Garden State shows how hard it is to address pocketbook issues.

item.title: Warren Buffett shocks shareholders by announcing his intention to retire at the end of the year
item.description: Earlier, Buffett warned Saturday about the dire global consequences of President Donald Trump's tariffs.

item.title: ‘Anything can happen’: Trump doesn't seem fazed by recession worries
item.description: Trump has blamed shaky economic numbers on his predecessor.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
